hero-desc: Experience unique and immersive Minecraft worlds with LuminaKraft Studios
onepieceworld-desc: Live the great adventure of One Piece: find Devil Fruits and master the seas.
ancientkraft-desc: RPG-style Adventure modpack with custom magic system, custom combat, and more
pt-the_full_course-desc: Flagship survival server with custom plugins and events
pt-full-course-desc: Flagship survival server with custom plugins and events
coming-soon-desc: Coming soon! Stay tuned for more information
server-feature-onepieceworld-1-desc: Consume powerful fruits that will grant you special abilities, but beware of the sea!
server-feature-onepieceworld-2-desc: Master Haki, martial arts and combat styles inspired by characters like Sanji or Zoro.
server-feature-onepieceworld-3-desc: Navigate through legendary islands, discover treasures and face dangerous pirates and marines.
server-feature-onepieceworld-4-desc: Join a crew, face other players, or form alliances to dominate the seas.
server-feature-ancientkraft-1-desc: Master unique spells and harness the power of the elements
server-feature-ancientkraft-2-desc: Experience thrilling battles with improved mechanics and abilities
server-feature-ancientkraft-3-desc: Discover ancient ruins, hidden treasures, and challenging dungeons
server-feature-ancientkraft-4-desc: Team up with friends or join a faction to conquer the world together
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-1-desc: Discover a world full of secrets and surprises to uncover
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-2-desc: Join a friendly and collaborative community of players
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-3-desc: Enjoy exclusive plugins that enhance your gaming experience
server-feature-pt-the_full_course-4-desc: Participate in special events and competitions organized by the staff
step1-desc-modpack: Get the installer from our official site
step2-desc-modpack: Follow the instructions in the installer
step3-desc-modpack: Open the game and press the "Set Sail to
step3-desc-vanilla: Add and connect to our server using the IP
auto-connect-desc: The modpack will automatically connect to the server when you click the "Set Sail to
services-intro: LuminaKraft Studios offers professional Minecraft server solutions for businesses and content creators:
collaborators-intro: Meet the talented collaborators who make our amazing servers possible:
about-1: Founded in 2024, LuminaKraft Studios has been at the forefront of innovation in Minecraft servers. Our team of passionate Minecraft enthusiasts and expert developers works tirelessly to create unique and engaging multiplayer experiences.
about-2: With a focus on community-driven content and cutting-edge server technology, we strive to push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of Minecraft.
ceo-description: With over 7 years of experience as a Minecraft server owner, Kristian is responsible for all technical and logical aspects of LuminaKraft Studios. As a FullStack developer experienced in Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, Kotlin, and PHP, he handles server hosting, web maintenance, Discord management, and all internal systems that make our gaming experiences possible.
ceo-skills: FullStack Developer | +7 years of MC experience
cofounder-description: Junior is the creative mind behind LuminaKraft Studios. With an exceptional imagination, he is responsible for conceiving the innovative ideas for our servers, drawing inspiration from the best games on the market. He coordinates our team of workers who help in building and testing servers in development.
workers-description: We have a dedicated team of collaborators who help us build and test our servers in development, ensuring that every detail is perfect before launch.
contact-intro: Interested in our services or have questions about our servers? Get in touch with us and we'll be happy to help you with anything you need!
donate-intro: Help us continue developing innovative servers and unique experiences in Minecraft. Your support is essential for us to continue creating quality content and improving our community.
leaderboard-description: These were the best players on the server. Click on a player to see more details.
